name: open_loot_box
attributes: # [doc = " LootBoxを開封し、報酬NFTをミントするが、"]
# [doc = " loot_box_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の照合チェックがない"]
body: let box_acc = & mut ctx . accounts . loot_box_account ;

let burn_accounts = Burn { mint : ctx . accounts . box_mint . to_account_info () , from : ctx . accounts . user_box_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . service_authority . to_account_info () , } ;
token :: burn (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , burn_accounts) , 1 ,) ? ;

let mint_accounts = MintTo { mint : ctx . accounts . reward_mint . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . user_reward_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . mint_authority . to_account_info () , } ;
token :: mint_to (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , mint_accounts) , ctx . accounts . config . reward_amount ,) ? ;

fields.name: loot_box_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を指定して所有者照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: user_box_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ユーザーのLootBoxトークンアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: service_authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " バーンおよびミント実行用サービス権限"]

fields.name: user_reward_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ユーザーの報酬受取用トークンアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: mint_authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " Mint権限を持つアカウント"]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 報酬数量を保持する設定アカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このLootBoxを所有するユーザーのPubkey"]

fields.name: reward_amount
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 開封時にミントする報酬NFT数"]
